[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `mg_vxprintf.specialized.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:323[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m7[0m[39m. `mg_log` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/src/log.[0m[1;92mc:43[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m9[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/mongoose/test/fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:32[0m[1;39m)[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Important observations  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Two stack objects in `mg_vxprintf` frame:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • ‘tmp’ at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    • ‘tmp371’ at [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ← overflow occurs here  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The write originates in the formatting logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfloating-point routines, string [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcopy, or character output[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The fuzzer harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m simply supplies input to `mg_http_parse`; it is [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot the root cause.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Areas for investigation  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Buffer allocation and size calculations in `mg_vxprintf` and related formatting[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunctions [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Implementation of `scpy` and how it writes into the local buffers.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[35m/[0m[39m `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` in `printf.c`, as they [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmanage the I/O buffer.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Interaction between `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble-to-string conversion[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and buffer [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcapacity.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Upstream calls in `mg_log` and `mg_http_parse` to understand formatting [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontexts that trigger the overflow.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root‐cause analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The one‐byte overflow is triggered in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m where a small [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte stack buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is passed as length‐[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` will write up to `dstlen-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` characters plus NUL into[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dst`. Mismatched `dstlen > actual buffer size` causes the overflow.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m correctly size their buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith `dstlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preserve existing logic  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must still format the mantissa and exponent separately for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvoking `mg_dtoa` for the mantissa and `mg_lld` for the exponent, then emitting [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mboth strings.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must not alter the harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or any utility functions outside of [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis specific formatting branch.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch outline  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m In `src/fmt.c`, locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch around line [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m:  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```c[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          …[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          …[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Change this snippet to use a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte stack buffer and pass the correct size [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmirroring the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```diff[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        n++;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      -        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Format mantissa into a sufficiently large buffer *[0m[35m/[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        n++;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Format exponent *[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      +        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ```[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m No other changes are needed in `scpy`, `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, or the fuzz [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Verification steps  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild the library and run the existing test suite to ensure no regressions [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min other formatting functions.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rerun the libFuzzer harness against `mg_http_parse` to confirm the [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer stack‐buffer‐overflow no longer reproduces.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By matching the buffer size and `dstlen` parameters used elsewhere, we [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39meliminate the off‐by‐one overflow without altering the formatting behavior.  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The increased buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrom [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is modest and consistent with [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother branches that handle variable‐length floating‐point representations.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Existing behaviors for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting, including precision of [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m digits [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand exponent emission, remain exactly the same.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No fuzz harness or I/O logic is touched, preserving the original test entry [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpoints.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Side‐effects & mitigation  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage for this branch increases by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes, which is negligible in [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtypical embedded or server environments.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If memory usage is a concern, one could alternatively reduce the `dstlen` [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39margument to match [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, but that would truncate mantissa precision. The [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapproach maintains full precision support.  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure code formatting and include directives [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`<math.h>`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain intact.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m327[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe OSS-Fuzz run on the mongoose codebase triggered an AddressSanitizer [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow in the formatting subsystem. The overflow originates in [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a small local buffer is exceeded during floating-point [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A patch was attempted that enlarges one temporary buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, changes the mg_dtoa call to use the dynamic size, and emits the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent separately. However, after rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, the same [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow persists at the same location in mg_vxprintf, indicating that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe buffer overflow is not fully addressed by the patch.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Initial Issue[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer exercises `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` → `mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` → [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf` → `scpy` → low-level output, and AddressSanitizer reports:[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • A write of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at a stack address [0m[1;39m([0m[39moffset [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf` overflows a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal array  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow frame is `mg_vxprintf` in src/fmt.c, line [0m[1;36m247[0m[39m  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Two local arrays in that frame:  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` originally [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m276[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m283[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    – `char tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m326[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The specific overflow target is `tmp371`, not the first `tmp` buffer  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The backtrace shows the write originates in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `scpy`[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey observations:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The overflow repeatedly occurs at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m of the stack frame, which matches [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe end of the second temp array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. The `%e` formatting branch in `mg_vxprintf` allocates only [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes for that [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msecond buffer, which is too small for certain exponent values.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The sanitizer log before and after the patch is nearly identical, confirming [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe overflow remains in the same code region.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Patch Attempt[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe candidate patch edits `src/fmt.c` around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[39m in `mg_vxprintf`. The diff [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--- a/src/fmt.c  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+++ b/src/fmt.c  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m14[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m315[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m16[0m[39m @@  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Format mantissa into a sufficiently large buffer *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Format exponent *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter rebuilding with this change, the fuzzer run again produces the same [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow:[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The SAN error still points at `mg_vxprintf` frame, offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The overflow object is again the second local array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m defined at line [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m319[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Post-Patch Log Snippet[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe sanitizer output after applying the patch remains:[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: stack-buffer-overflow on address [0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m…  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWRITE of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at [0m[1;36m0x[0m[39m… thread T0  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m…  [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFrame #[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m: mg_pfn_iobuf_private [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprintf.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFrame #[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: mg_vxprintf [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m…  [0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis frame has [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m [0m[1;35mobject[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m276[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m'tmp371'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mline [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  <== overflow at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m### Areas for Further Investigation[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTo understand the root cause and fully address the overflow, the following parts of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe code should be reviewed:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **All uses of local temp buffers in mg_vxprintf**  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Identify every `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[33m...[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` allocation in that function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mboth at lines [0m[1;36m276[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand [0m[1;36m319[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and verify they are sized according to the maximum formatted output [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **Implementation of mg_dtoa and mg_lld**  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Confirm that these number-to-string routines cannot generate output longer than [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe supplied buffer, and that they correctly respect a `size` parameter.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **scpy behavior**  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Ensure that `scpy` properly bounds its writes by the length argument and does [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnot write a trailing NUL byte without sufficient space.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Formatting logic for exponent and mantissa**  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Consider whether extremely large or small exponent values can exceed expected [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdigit counts and thus overflow any fixed-size buffer.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Potential missing bounds checks**  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Look for code paths in `mg_vxprintf` that lack checks against the buffer size [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbefore calling `mg_dtoa`, `mg_lld`, `scpy`, or direct character output via `out`.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy examining these areas, one can build a complete picture of how numeric [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting in fmt.c leads to stack-buffer-overflow and address all under-sized [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers or missing length checks.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m282[0m[39m:          int64_t v = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m283[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m284[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_long == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m286[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned long[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m287[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m289[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, s ? [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v : [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39munsigned[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m v, s, h[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m290[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m291[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j < xl && w > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w--;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m292[0m[39m:        for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mj = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; pad == [0m[32m' '[0m[39m && !minus && k < w && j + k < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m293[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m294[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[32m"0x"[0m[39m, xl[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m317[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m318[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m320[0m[39m:          int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m321[0m[39m:          double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m322[0m[39m:          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m334[0m[39m:        n += [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m335[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m336[0m[39m:      i++;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m337[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m338[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, n++, i++;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m339[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m340[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m341[0m[39m:  return n;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m342[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
