[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:Lg7 = [0m[1;36m1.479819860511658591e-01[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC2F112 DF3E5244 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m22:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:     [0m[39munion [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mdouble f; uint64_t i;[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m u = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdouble hfsq,f,s,z,R,w,t1,t2,dk,y,hi,lo,val_hi,val_lo;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:     [0m[39muint64_t hx;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:     [0m[39mint k;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx < [0m[1;36m0x00100000[0m[39m || hx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i<<[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m/[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx*x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m+[0m[1;36m-0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m=-inf *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  return result;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:1[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m200[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"fmt.h"[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"printf.h"[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m:#include [0m[32m"util.h"[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m:static bool [0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m:  return c >= [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m && c <= [0m[32m'9'[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m8[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m9[0m[39m:static const double[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m10[0m[39m:ivln10hi  = [0m[1;36m4.34294481878168880939e-01[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3fdbcb7b[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x15200000[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m11[0m[39m:ivln10lo  = [0m[1;36m2.50829467116452752298e-11[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3dbb9438[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0xca9aadd5[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m12[0m[39m:log10_2hi = [0m[1;36m3.01029995663611771306e-01[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3FD34413[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x509F6000[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m13[0m[39m:log10_2lo = [0m[1;36m3.69423907715893078616e-13[0m[39m, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;36m0x3D59FEF3[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x11F12B36[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m14[0m[39m:Lg1 = [0m[1;36m6.666666666666735130e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FE55555 [0m[1;36m55555593[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m15[0m[39m:Lg2 = [0m[1;36m3.999999999940941908e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FD99999 9997FA04 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m16[0m[39m:Lg3 = [0m[1;36m2.857142874366239149e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FD24924 [0m[1;36m94229359[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m17[0m[39m:Lg4 = [0m[1;36m2.222219843214978396e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FCC71C5 1D8E78AF *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m18[0m[39m:Lg5 = [0m[1;36m1.818357216161805012e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC74664 96CB03DE *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m19[0m[39m:Lg6 = [0m[1;36m1.531383769920937332e-01[0m[39m,  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC39A09 D078C69F *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m20[0m[39m:Lg7 = [0m[1;36m1.479819860511658591e-01[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* 3FC2F112 DF3E5244 *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m21[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m22:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m23[0m[39m:     [0m[39munion [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mdouble f; uint64_t i;[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m u = [0m[1;39m{[0m[39mx[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m24[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdouble hfsq,f,s,z,R,w,t1,t2,dk,y,hi,lo,val_hi,val_lo;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m25[0m[39m:     [0m[39muint64_t hx;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m26[0m[39m:     [0m[39mint k;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m27[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m28[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m29[0m[39m:     [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx < [0m[1;36m0x00100000[0m[39m || hx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m30[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i<<[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m31[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m/[0m[1;39m([0m[39mx*x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m+[0m[1;36m-0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m=-inf *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m32[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mif [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m31[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  return result;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:    return x;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:    return -x;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:static int [0m[1;35maddexp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *buf, int e, int sign[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:  int n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:  buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sign;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me > [0m[1;36m400[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39me < [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m263[0m[39m:          while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr *= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, pr += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc - [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m264[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m267[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'l'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m268[0m[39m:        is_long++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m323[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m324[0m[39m:          [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m325[0m[39m:          n++;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m326[0m[39m:    [0m[39m        [0m[39m  k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m327[0m[39m:          n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root-cause analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack overflow originates in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mfmt.[0m[1;92mc:318[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m327[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a tiny local buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is used for both the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa and exponent, yet calls into `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` can easily exceed [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Sanitizer logs consistently point to the second temp buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnamed `tmp371` in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe stack map[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at offsets `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` being overflowed by a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write at offset [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m.[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preserve existing functionality  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other floating-point formats [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%g`, `%f`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m already use `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and pass [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa`, and work without overflow.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fix must mirror that safe pattern in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch, without [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maltering any harness, fuzzing logic, or public API.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Implementation Steps  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Open `src/fmt.c` and locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch within `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m318[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Change the local buffer declaration from  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      to  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      ensuring it matches the size used in the `%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch.  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Update the call to `mg_dtoa` to pass the actual buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minstead of literal `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`, and use the parsed precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m rather than hard-coded[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m`:  [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        - Before: `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        - After:  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```c[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;                      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m default precision[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa,     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m safe dstlen[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                       [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m honor parsed precision[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Leave the `mg_lld` call intact, since writing the exponent into a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer cannot overflow for any realistic double exponent [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmax ±[0m[1;36m308[0m[39m yields at most [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m chars[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. No other branches or utility functions need modification.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Enlarging the buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes matches the safe pattern in other code paths [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand provides ample room for:  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • A signed mantissa with decimal point and up to `pr` digits  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The literal `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m` marker  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The exponent string [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding sign and up to three digits[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to `mg_dtoa` ensures that even if `mg_dtoa` generates a [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarger string internally, it will be properly truncated by `mg_snprintf` to fit the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdestination buffer.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Honoring the parsed precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m prevents hidden bugs where custom [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprecisions in `%e` formats were ignored.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Preservation of existing logic  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Other format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%g`, `%f`, `%d`, `%x`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain untouched.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The patch does not modify fuzzing harnesses, tests, or utility routines.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Performance impact is minimal [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstack allocation of [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m vs. [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes is [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnegligible[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Side-effect mitigation  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Review `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` to confirm they do not use more than [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maggregate; existing code uses internal buffers of [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes and restricts writes via[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`dstlen`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No additional bounds checks are needed in `mg_lld` because exponent strings [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mare small.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Validation  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild mongoose, rerun OSS-Fuzz for `mg_http_parse` harness.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm AddressSanitizer reports no further stack‐buffer‐overflow in [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests to ensure no regressions.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Manually test `printf`-style `%e` with extreme values and custom precisions [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., `%.20e`, `%.1e`, very large/small doubles[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to verify correctness.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mFUZZING_ENGINE[0m=[35mlibfuzzer[0m                                                           [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + export [33mSKIP_SEED_CORPUS[0m=[1;36m1[0m                                                          [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         + [33mSKIP_SEED_CORPUS[0m=[1;36m1[0m                                                                 [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer stack-buffer-overflow was triggered during fuzzing in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min fmt.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, when formatting floating-point values with the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%e` or `%E` specifier. A patch attempt enlarged the temporary buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes, introduced a default precision of [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m, and adjusted calls to `mg_dtoa`. After [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplying the patch, the same stack-buffer-overflow recurred at the same stack [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocation in `mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzzer run [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m invoked `mg_http_parse`, which logged data [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer reported a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write past the end of a stack buffer in [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcalled by `scpy`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, originating from a call chain rooted in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow occurred at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the stack frame of `mg_vxprintf`. Two [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlocal arrays are allocated in that frame:  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbefore[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m declared around line [0m[1;36m276[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[33m...[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` declared around line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, spanning bytes [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The faulty write index corresponds exactly to the end of `tmp371`, indicating [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat `scpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcopying into the output buffer[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m attempted to read or write one byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond `tmp371`’s boundary.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant observations in the initial log  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan stack redzones and object sizes pinpoint the overflow to `mg_vxprintf` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mframe.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The function `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is the immediate caller that triggers the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflow, copying `k` bytes from `tmp`.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack frame holds multiple temporary buffers; the overflow happens in the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msecond buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch of `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt.c around line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Enlarged `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Added a fallback precision `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;`.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Changed the `mg_dtoa` call to pass `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr` instead of [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhardcoded limits.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Left the exponent formatting via `mg_lld` unchanged except for comments.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The rest of the code structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`scpy`, `out`, looping logic[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remained the same.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult of the patch  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- After rebuilding and re-running the fuzzer, AddressSanitizer reported the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentical stack-buffer-overflow.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow still targets offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m in the same `mg_vxprintf` frame, and still [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspills over the `tmp371` object.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The failure stack trace and shadow bytes map are effectively unchanged, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming that enlarging the first `tmp` buffer did not prevent the overflow in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe second temporary.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The layout and sizing of local buffers in `mg_vxprintf`, particularly the second [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m declared around line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- How `k` is computed and passed to `scpy` when copying from these buffers—ensure [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat `k` never exceeds each buffer’s actual size.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All formatting paths in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot only `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, since other [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mspecifiers may use the same buffers or logic.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `scpy` and its interaction with the I/O buffer functions [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private` [0m[35m/[0m[39m `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to confirm the correct bounds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp84mcn9ak[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
