[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer–reported stack-buffer-overflow occurring [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min the `mg_vxprintf` function [0m[1;39m([0m[39mspecifically in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` floating-point [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting path[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when called via the fuzz harness. The overflow happens in a small [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtemporary buffer on the stack [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which a single byte write exceeds.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe patch attempt increases one of the temporary buffers from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, adds a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mruntime clamp for the precision [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pr`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m defaulting it to [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m when unspecified, and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpasses the buffer’s size into `mg_dtoa`. After re-running the fuzzer, the same [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-buffer-overflow recurs at the identical stack offset.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The failure arises during fuzz testing of the HTTP parser, which ultimately [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls `mg_vxprintf` to format log messages.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - AddressSanitizer pinpoints a write of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m beyond the end of a [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack-allocated buffer in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe at `fmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Two local arrays exist in that frame:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter the patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m located at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `tmp371` located at offsets [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow writes at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, just past `tmp371`.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The call stack leads from `mg_http_parse` → `mg_log` → `mg_vxprintf` → `scpy` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m→ `mg_putchar_iobuf_static`.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `src/fmt.c`, inside the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m315[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Changed `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;` to `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Inserted `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;`  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Modified the call to `mg_dtoa` from `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Left the subsequent `mg_lld` call unchanged.  [0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After patching, the same fuzzer command [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexecuted.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The log again shows a stack-buffer-overflow in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` at the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame offset in `mg_vxprintf`.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Observations & Next Areas for Investigation  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The overflow remains in the same stack frame, indicating that enlarging only [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe first buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m did not address writes into `tmp371`.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The variable named `tmp371`—introduced by the compiler or macro [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexpansion—resides at the top of the frame. The code path likely writes formatted [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcharacters [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvia `scpy` and `out`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that exceed the combined space of all [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtemporaries.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Functions and code areas to inspect further:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `mg_vxprintf` in `src/fmt.c`: review all local buffers, loop bounds, and [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls to `scpy`.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `scpy` implementation [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: ensure it respects both source [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength and destination capacity.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • `mg_dtoa` and `mg_lld` in `src/fmt.c`: verify they never return a length [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarger than the caller’s buffer.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • The I/O buffering functions in `src/printf.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_pfn_iobuf_private`, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_putchar_iobuf_static`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: confirm they handle multi-byte writes safely.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Code paths for other format specifiers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%f`, `%g`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that share the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame frame layout.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A holistic view of `mg_vxprintf`’s stack layout and all write sites is needed [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto identify why `tmp371` is being overflowed.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The stack overflow in `mg_vxprintf`’s `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch is caused by two [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfactors:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m A too‐small local buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to hold the mantissa or exponent [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstrings.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mismatched length arguments passed to the formatting routines: the code [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, …, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhard-coded “[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m” as the `buf_len`, and [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprecision “[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which does not reflect the real buffer size.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The helper `mg_lld` writes into the same small buffer without any bounds [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The prior patch correctly identified that this branch must mirror the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%g`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%f` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich uses a [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m-byte buffer and passes its size to `mg_dtoa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m but[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas never applied [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor did not actually land[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  The fuzzer still sees an [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Critical Logic to Preserve[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The scientific‐notation algorithm: taking `double d`, computing `exponent = [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mfloor[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[39m|d|[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, `mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m^exponent`, calling `mg_dtoa` to format the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa, emitting the literal `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`, then formatting the exponent via [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_lld`.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The I/O buffering [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`scpy` + `out`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m must remain untouched to preserve existing [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzzer harness behavior.[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed Patch Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In `src/fmt.c`, inside `mg_vxprintf`’s `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Change the local temporary buffer from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmatch the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          - `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            → `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Clamp the precision if unspecified:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          - `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;`[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Call `mg_dtoa` with the actual buffer capacity, not a hard-coded “[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m”:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          - `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. After emitting the mantissa and the literal `[0m[32m'e'[0m[39m` or `[0m[32m'E'[0m[39m`, call `mg_lld` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto the same buffer:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          - `k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          - `n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Remove any stray hard-coded length arguments [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., the “[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m” in the old [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` call[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Verify and Harden `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mif necessary[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Inspect `mg_dtoa`’s implementation to ensure it never writes beyond the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`buf_len` passed in.  If it currently ignores `buf_len`, add guards inside [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa` to stop writing when the next character would exceed `buf_len - [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mreserve one for the NUL or just to respect redzones[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - This ensures that even if `pr` is maliciously large [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., fuzz‐generated [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformat `%e.1000000e`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the library will truncate or clamp the output to the local [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer’s capacity rather than overflow it.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Testing and Verification[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Rebuild the library, run `run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m` to confirm the overflow [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `mg_vxprintf` no longer triggers.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding those for `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe have not regressed correct behavior.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side Effects and Mitigations[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Increasing the local buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes incurs negligible stack overhead in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtypical embedded/web‐server contexts.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensuring `mg_dtoa` respects `buf_len` prevents future overflows across *all* [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot just scientific notation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  It does not alter existing [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msemantics when `pr` is reasonable.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All fuzz harnesses, tests, and I/O‐buffering routines remain unchanged, so [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother parts of the codebase are unaffected.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Implementation Justification[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Mirroring the working `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch directly localizes the fix to the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mminimal context, preserving all existing logic while addressing the root cause.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Clamping `pr` and passing `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` ensures `mg_dtoa` cannot exceed the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack buffer.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness, test code, or external libraries are modified, fulfilling project [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpolicy.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/29/25 20:41:12][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=972254;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=38884;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m5[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m

[2;36m[12/29/25 20:42:33][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.[1;33mPATCH[0m -> TeamStatus.EVALUATE                    ]8;id=170109;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=37742;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m5[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                       ]8;id=252099;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=70655;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\
[2;36m[12/29/25 20:42:34][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Took [1;36m0.94[0m seconds;              ]8;id=91210;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=155044;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m ===Evaluator [33mResult[0m===                                                              ]8;id=879245;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/teams/evaluation/evaluator.py\[2mevaluator.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=587638;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/teams/evaluation/evaluator.py#204\[2m204[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         PatchStatus.VULNERABLE                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluator [33mDiff[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         --- a/src/fmt.c                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         +++ b/src/fmt.c                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-315[0m,[1;36m17[0m +[1;36m315[0m,[1;36m18[0m @@                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                  for [1m([0mj = [1;36m0[0m; minus && pr [1m<[0m[39m w && j + pr < w; j++[0m[1;39m)[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, &pad, [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'e'[0m[39m || c == [0m[32m'E'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-       [0m[39m        [0m[39m  char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           double d = [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, double[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           int64_t exponent = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           double mantissa = d [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-          k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp84mcn9ak[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report flagged a stack-buffer-overflow in the `mg_vxprintf` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting routine in `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`, triggered while fuzzing HTTP [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing. The overflow occurs when formatting scientific notation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwriting past a small local buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m on the stack. A patch was applied that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39menlarged one temporary buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m from [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes, passed its size into [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_dtoa`, and supplied a default precision for the `%e` branch. Despite these [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchanges, the same overflow recurred at the same stack offset, indicating the patch [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdid not address all buffer usages or the correct buffer in that code path.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzzing run with AddressSanitizer detected a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte write past the end of a [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack buffer in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer stack trace points to `scpy` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstring copy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m invoked in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch. The overflow target is a second local array [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m allocated at stack [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moffset [0m[1;36m112[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m120[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The vulnerable frame in `mg_vxprintf` defines two local arrays:  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min the patch attempt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp371[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39munchanged[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow occurs when more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m bytes are written into `tmp371`. The log [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshows write at offset [0m[1;36m120[0m[39m, exactly one byte past the end of `tmp371`.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey Observations from Initial Log  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The failure originates in `mg_pfn_iobuf_private` → `mg_putchar_iobuf_static` → [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy` within `mg_vxprintf`.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack frame shows two objects: `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m72[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwrite hits the redzone immediately following `tmp371`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow happens unconditionally in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` formatting branch without [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecking precision bounds or buffer size.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `src/fmt.c`, the buffer for the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch was changed:  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` → `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Calls to `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, …, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` → `[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpr, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • A default precision `pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m` is applied when `pr` is unset.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The patch did not modify the second temporary [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m at lines around [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhere the overflow was originally observed.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The post-patch sanitizer log shows the same overflow at the same address and [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack offset, again pointing to `tmp371`. The `%e` branch continues to write beyond[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371`’s bounds.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPost-Patch Log Highlights  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer report is nearly identical: stack overflow in `mg_vxprintf` → [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy`.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow still targets the redzone after `tmp371` [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m112[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m120[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The new size of the first `tmp` buffer does not affect `tmp371`, so writing via [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`scpy` into `tmp371` remains unchecked.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definition and usage of `tmp371` in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m319[0m[39m of [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/mongoose/src/fmt.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and any other small local buffers in that function.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- All code paths in `mg_vxprintf` that call `scpy`, `mg_dtoa`, or `mg_lld` to [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mensure buffer sizes are adequate before writes.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic computing formatted lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`k`, `pr`, `w`, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to verify they never[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexceed the assigned buffer capacities.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Interaction between the two local buffers [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tmp` and `tmp371`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and how they are [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchosen or overwritten in different formatting branches.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar formatting branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `%f`, `%g`, numeric conversions[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that may use [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp371` or other fixed-size arrays.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m33[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx-x[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m0.0[0m[39m; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[39m-#[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m = NaN *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m34[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* subnormal number, scale x up *[0m[35m/[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m35[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mk -= [0m[1;36m54[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m36[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mx *= [0m[1;36m0x1[0m[39mp54;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m37[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mu.f = x;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m38[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mhx = u.i>>[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m39[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx >= [0m[1;36m0x7ff00000[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn x;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m41[0m[39m:     [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx == [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m && u.i<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m42[0m[39m:     [0m[39m        [0m[39mreturn [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m43[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* reduce x into [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m44[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx += [0m[1;36m0x3ff00000[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m45[0m[39m:     [0m[39mk += [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx>>[0m[1;36m20[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m - [0m[1;36m0x3ff[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m46[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhx = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhx&[0m[1;36m0x000fffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;36m0x3fe6a09e[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m47[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mhx<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m | [0m[1;39m([0m[39mu.i&[0m[1;36m0xffffffff[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m48[0m[39m:     [0m[39mx = u.f;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m49[0m[39m:     [0m[39mf = x - [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m50[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhfsq = [0m[1;36m0.5[0m[39m*f*f;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m51[0m[39m:     [0m[39ms = f/[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2.0[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m52[0m[39m:     [0m[39mz = s*s;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m53[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = z*z;[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m54[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt1 = w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg2+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg4+w*Lg6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m55[0m[39m:     [0m[39mt2 = z*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg1+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg3+w*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mLg5+w*Lg7[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m56[0m[39m:     [0m[39mR = t2 + t1;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m57[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* See log2.c for details. *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m58[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* hi+lo = f - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ~ [0m[1;35mlog[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m59[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = f - hfsq;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m60[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.f = hi;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m61[0m[39m:     [0m[39mu.i &= [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m<<[0m[1;36m32[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m62[0m[39m:     [0m[39mhi = u.f;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m63[0m[39m:     [0m[39mlo = f - hi - hfsq + s*[0m[1;39m([0m[39mhfsq+R[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m64[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m* val_hi+val_lo ~ [0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m+f[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + k*[0m[1;35mlog10[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m65[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = hi*ivln10hi;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m66[0m[39m:     [0m[39mdk = k;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m67[0m[39m:     [0m[39my = dk*log10_2hi;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m68[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo = dk*log10_2lo + [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlo+hi[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*ivln10lo + lo*ivln10hi;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m69[0m[39m:     [0m[35m/[0m[39m*[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m70[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * Extra precision in for adding y is not strictly needed[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m71[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * since there is no very large cancellation near x = [0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m72[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * x = [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m/[0m[1;35msqrt[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we do it anyway since it costs little on CPUs[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m73[0m[39m:     [0m[39m * with some parallelism and it reduces the error for many args.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m74[0m[39m:     [0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m75[0m[39m:     [0m[39mw = y + val_hi;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_lo += [0m[1;39m([0m[39my - w[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + val_hi;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:     [0m[39mval_hi = w;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:     [0m[39mreturn val_lo + val_hi;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m81:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mpower[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble base, int64_t exponent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:  double result = [0m[1;36m1.0[0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:  int64_t i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent > [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:      result *= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mexponent < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < -exponent; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:      result [0m[35m/[0m[39m= base;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m If exponent is [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, result remains [0m[1;36m1.0[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  return result;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m99:d[0m[39mouble [0m[1;35mmy_fabs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdouble x[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mx >= [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:247[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m342[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m247[0m[39m:  size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m248[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m249[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[32m'%'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m250[0m[39m:      size_t j, k, x = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, is_long = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, w = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[39m* width *[0m[35m/[0m[39m, pr = ~0U [0m[35m/[0m[39m* prec *[0m[35m/[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m251[0m[39m:      char pad = [0m[32m' '[0m[39m, minus = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m252[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'#'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m x++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m253[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'-'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m minus++, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m254[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pad = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m255[0m[39m:      while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m w *= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, w += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc - [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m256[0m[39m:      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'.'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m257[0m[39m:        c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m258[0m[39m:        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'*'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m259[0m[39m:          pr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mva_arg[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*ap, int[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m260[0m[39m:          c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m262[0m[39m:          pr = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m263[0m[39m:          while [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mis_digit[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr *= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, pr += [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc - [0m[32m'0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m264[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m265[0m[39m:      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m266[0m[39m:      while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc == [0m[32m'h'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m c = fmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39m++i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Treat h and hh as int[0m                  [2m                [0m
