[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m209[0m[39m:  uint64_t v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m val;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m210[0m[39m:  size_t s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n, i;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m211[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_signed && val < [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m, v = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint64_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39m-val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m212[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m This loop prints a number in reverse order. I guess this is because we[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m213[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m write numbers from right to left: least significant digit comes last.[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m214[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Maybe because we use Arabic numbers, and Arabs write RTL?[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m215[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mis_hex[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m216[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v >>= [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv & [0m[1;36m15[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m217[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m218[0m[39m:    for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mn = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; v; v [0m[35m/[0m[39m= [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = letters[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mv % [0m[1;36m10[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m219[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m220[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Reverse a string[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m221[0m[39m:  for [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m; i < n [0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m; i++[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m222[0m[39m:    char t = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m223[0m[39m:    buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + i[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms + n - i - [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = t;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m224[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m225[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mval == [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mn++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'0'[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle special case[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m226[0m[39m:  return n + s;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m227[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:229[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m234[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m229[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid [0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar, void *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, void *ptr, char *buf,[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m230[0m[39m:                          size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m231[0m[39m:  size_t i = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m232[0m[39m:  while [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi < len && buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m[32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m, ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m233[0m[39m:  return i;[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m234[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/fmt.[0m[1;92mc:138[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m145[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:static size_t [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *dst, size_t dstlen, double d, int width, bool tz[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  char buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  int i, s = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, n = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, e = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  double t, mul, saved;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md == [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"0"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisinf[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, d > [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m ? [0m[32m"inf"[0m[39m : [0m[32m"-inf"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mxisnan[0m[1;39m([0m[39md[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return [0m[1;35mmg_snprintf[0m[1;39m([0m[39mdst, dstlen, [0m[32m"%s"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"nan"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39md < [0m[1;36m0.0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m d = -d, buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39ms++[0m[1;39m][0m[39m = [0m[32m'-'[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview and Root Cause  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Analysis of the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch in `mg_vxprintf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`src/fmt.c` lines ~[0m[1;36m317[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m328[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshows a mismatch between the allocated buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the size [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpassed to `mg_dtoa` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m` bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  Because `mg_dtoa` can write up to `dstlen` bytes[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto `tmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand often writes more than [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the call to `[0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[39m, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moverflows the [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m‐byte stack buffer.  The same small buffer is then reused for the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexponent via `mg_lld`, but the underlying overflow happens in the floating‐point [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mformatting.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Fix Outline  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Increase the local buffer in the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch to the same capacity used [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mby the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi.e., [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Pass the true buffer size [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m into `mg_dtoa` instead of a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhard‐coded `[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Mirror the default‐precision logic used by the `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   d. Leave the subsequent call to `[0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` unchanged—since [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tmp` is now large enough to accommodate any exponent string.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   e. Do **not** modify any harness, fuzzing logic, or external library code.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Open `src/fmt.c` and locate the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` case in the big `[0m[1;35mwhile[0m[1;39m([0m[39mfmt[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mi[0m[1;39m][0m[39m != [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m'\0'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` switch around line [0m[1;36m317[0m[39m.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Change the buffer declaration from  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      to  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m;`  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Just before the call to `mg_dtoa`, add the default‐precision check:  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpr == ~0U[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr = [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m;`  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Replace the existing `mg_dtoa` call:  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      with  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         `k = [0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, mantissa, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pr, c == [0m[32m'e'[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Leave the code that outputs `tmp`, the format character `c`, and the exponent[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munchanged except for the larger buffer, i.e.:  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mout[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, param[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n++;[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         k = [0m[1;35mmg_lld[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, exponent, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         n += [0m[1;35mscpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout, param, tmp, k[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m. Rebuild and rerun the full test suite, including the HTTP‐fuzzing harness, to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirm the AddressSanitizer error is resolved and no regressions occur.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By enlarging the buffer to [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m bytes [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe same as in other floating‐point [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranches[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and passing its true size to `mg_dtoa`, we guarantee that `mg_dtoa` will [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnever write past `tmp`’s end.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Preserving the default precision of [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m ensures that existing formatting [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbehavior remains unchanged when no precision is specified.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Keeping the exponent‐printing call [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_lld`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m unmodified is safe because the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnew [0m[1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte buffer comfortably fits any exponent string [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding sign and digits [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor typical IEEE‐[0m[1;36m754[0m[39m ranges[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness or external code is altered; all changes are localized to [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_vxprintf`, eliminating the stack‐buffer overflow without affecting test logic [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor coverage.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects and Mitigation  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Stack usage in `mg_vxprintf` increases by [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m bytes; this is negligible in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontext of typical server stacks.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No change in formatting semantics; existing tests and logs will behave [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentically.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Because the `%e` branch now exactly matches the safety pattern of the [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branches, we close this corner of the code to further buffer‐size [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmismatches.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. References to Similar Code  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The `%f`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%g` branch at lines [0m[1;36m273[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m283[0m[39m already uses `char tmp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m40[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_dtoa[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  We align the `%e`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`%E` branch to this proven [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpattern, ensuring consistency across all floating‐point formatting paths.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
